title: Ishiyama-dera Digital Engi Emaki
synopsis: The Ishiyama-dera temple in Outsu announced that the temple's Ishiyama-dera engi emaki scrolls will get their first CG anime adaptation as part of a "Ishiyama-dera Digital engi emaki Project." The anime will depict the first story in the first scroll, which illustrates the Hira Myoujin deity appearing before temple founder R≈çben in the form of an old man, and giving him an oracle to construct the Ishiyama-dera.
